Lithaton is the main continent.
Adanac is the city where we are right at the moment.
Celeres is a great city in the far east. This used to be the capital of Lithaton until the king moved to Casteldine.
Casteldine is the capital of Lithaton, and this is also where king Arturo lives.

Natalon is a great warrior who was born and raised here in Adanac. He is famous for the battle in Casteldine, where he and his men saved the entire city from the orcish hordes. This is also where he met his fate. A monument is raised to his honour there.
King Arturo, long praise his name, is a very great man. His father lived in Celeres, but when the castle in Casteldine was built Arturo moved there.
Tha'Reen is a city built on the desert island Dustwit. Settlers was sent there long ago and now the city has came to play an important role in the trading world.
Dustwit is an enormous island south-west of Lithaton. On here the city Tha'Reen is built.
Hagal and Gardar are two ice islands in the far north. No real civilization lives here, only small huts with peaceful fishermen.
